titleStmt.title: A poem royal to the sacred Maiesty of Charles the II. King of Great Britain. And the illustrious Donna Catharina His incomparable consort. / By J.L. Esq
titleStmt.author: J. L.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spread-Eagle near the west-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "COnfusion, with grey winter's snow's dis-".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
